problems.title: Print All Subsets of a String (Recursive)
problems.description:
Given a string S (without spaces), print all its subsets (the power set) using recursion. The order does not matter, but each subset should be printed on a new line. Print the empty subset as an empty line.

Input Format:
A single string S.

Output Format:
Print all subsets (including empty) of S, one per line.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
ab

Sample Output

a
b
ab
(Note: Any order is accepted as long as all 4 subsets appear exactly once.)
hintsList: At each index, choose to include or exclude the character. When idx reaches length, print the accumulated subset.
